title: linking with `link.exe` failed: exit code: 1120
body:
I am using the following command to istall diesel_cli
**cargo install diesel_cli --no-default-features --features "mysql"**
I installed MySql Connector C 6.1 also I have Visual Studio 2019 in my Windows 10 PC.

error: linking with `link.exe` failed: exit code: 1120
